content:
isaacvetter edited Issue #295(assigned to isaacvetter)

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 89

Submitted by @cmoesel from MITRE

Chapter: Quick Start
Section: Building an EHR Service
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

Building an EHR Service

Proposed Wording:

Building a CDS Service Host

Comment:
What is described is more like building a service host or platform than a service. Suggest renaming to "Building a CDS Service Host" or "Integrating CDS Services into an EHR" or something like that.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cmoesel commented on Issue #295

No idea. My comment doesn't seem to reference any typos. Maybe it came up in ballot reconciliation discussion, but either I wasn't there or I don't remember it.

kpshek commented on Issue #295

Fixed and merged to master in f131776. Closing.
